title: Fruits and Roots
description: Serves light meals, healthy drinks, desserts, some vegan dishes, and cakes made to order. Also has a health food store selling dried fruits, large selection of nuts and dried legumes, grains, spices, condiments, tonics, fresh nut butters, tofu, seaweed, green teas, rice milk, and more.
streetAddress: Shop G 13, Hobart Corner Shopping Centre, Bryanston, Gauteng
